channel.title: Pages on Yumov0's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Yumov0's Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hello! I’m Yumov0, a passionate programmer(noob) from China.

I love exploring new ideas, learning about Frontend/Backend/MoCap/Sports, and sharing my knowledge with others.

This blog is a space where I document my thoughts, projects, and everything in between.

My Background

Currently I am studying my Sport Science M.S. at Beijing Sport University, where I focused on software development related to motion analysis.

Over the years, I’ve gained experience in Unity3D/Django/Mocap, and I continue to expand my horizons by delving into new topics that catch my interest.

What I Write About

On this blog, you’ll find posts about:

  • [Topic 1]: [Brief description]

  • [Topic 2]: [Brief description]

  • [Topic 3]: [Brief description]

I’m always curious and eager to learn, so you’ll also see a mix of other topics that intrigue me, from technology and coding to personal reflections and life lessons.

Get in Touch

If you’d like to connect or have any questions, feel free to reach out to me at mosiyu@bsu.edu . I’m always open to discussions, collaborations, or just a friendly chat.

Thanks for stopping by!

item.title: Links
item.description:
To use this feature, add links section to frontmatter.

This page’s frontmatter:

links:
 - title: GitHub
 description: GitHub is the world's largest software development platform.
 website: https://github.com
 image: https://github.githubassets.com/images/modules/logos_page/GitHub-Mark.png
 - title: TypeScript
 description: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.
 website: https://www.typescriptlang.org
 image: ts-logo-128.jpg

image field accepts both local and external images.
